title: Disney fires director
author: VD
content_html:
Exiting. It’s the same as being fired, but when you’re a well-known leftie, the media will make it sound nicer for you.

James Gunn is exiting Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3.

The move comes after conservative personalities resurfaced old tweets Thursday in which the filmmaker joked about controversial topics such as pedophelia and rape. Gunn has been an outspoken critic of President Donald Trump.

“The offensive attitudes and statements discovered on James’ Twitter feed are indefensible and inconsistent with our studio’s values, and we have severed our business relationship with him,” Walt Disney Studios chairman Alan Horn said in a statement Friday.

Of course, given that it’s Disney and all, one has to wonder if the problem was that the jokes were being told at the pedos’ expense.

The disgusting tweets were brought to light by journalists Mike Cernovich, Jack Posobiec, and director Gabe Hoffman

Journalists… and Castalia House authors. Good work, gentlemen.
